idea-plugin.name: Json Master
idea-plugin.description:
Tired of opening a browser to validating and formatting JSON?
Annoyed of generating a Class of Java/Kotlin/Dart from JSON?
Why don't you install Json Master and do the job inside the IDEA with offline support?
Json Master is a lightweight plugin for validating and formatting JSON strings and generating a Class from a JSON strings.
Try install it and spread the word :)
